name: Craig Miller
content: Craig S. Miller -- Home Site Craig S. Miller Professor School of Computing DePaul University Home Teaching Research Background Contact Teaching for Fall 2025 IT 411 Scripting for Interactive Systems Wednesday 5:45 to 9:00 Lewis 1513 and online Scheduled office hours (CDM 745 and by zoom on request) Tuesday 2:30pm to 4pm By appointment Hours are posted in central time Email me for Zoom link Additional office hours are available by appointment. I'm usually available for weekday afternoons. Office location: 745 CDM Building (243 S. Wabash Ave.) Phone: 312-362-5085 If you are visiting for office hours, please email me or call my extension (x25085) from the 7th floor lobby when you arrive.
